definition: board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious

sentences.english: You are very successful in Spain. We all read about it.
sentences.chinese: 你在板鴨很成功啊，我們都拜讀了。

sentences.english: From this that Nanjing's pressed salted duck, the salty wild duck, starts to move toward the nation.
sentences.chinese: 由此那個南京的板鴨，鹽水鴨，開始走向全國。

definition: chicken in rice wine/also translated drunken chicken
jelly snack made by kneading jelly fig seeds 愛玉子|爱玉子[ai4 yu4 zi3] in water and combining with flavorings (popular in Taiwan and Singapore)
imagawayaki (sweet snack made of batter cooked in the shape of a car wheel, stuffed with azuki bean paste or other fillings)
ching bo leung, an icy, sweet dessert soup
shumai (shao mai) steamed dumpling/also written 燒賣|烧卖[shao1 mai4]
Cantonese poached chicken, known as "white cut chicken"
